alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:42PM CDT until June 15 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Western Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 241 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elba to 8 miles southwest of Samson, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Geneva, Enterprise, Dothan, Bonifay, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Level Plains, Slocomb, Samson, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee and Grimes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
